xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:wildaside</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation name="TEXT">Default value is 1. Giving a value lower or higher than 1 will reduce the range that the biome spawns in proportionally</field></block></value><next><block type="write_json"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="JOBJVAR">local:jsonobject</field><field name="VAR">local:wildaside</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
